## Overview

This is a placeholder for a lab that will introduce you to the Julia programming language.

## Submitting your work

In lab 01, you learned how to render a Quarto document.
For this lab (and all subsequent labs) you will submit your code via Google Classroom and your *rendered output* via Canvas:

1. Commit and push all your changes to GitHub classroom.
1. Render your document to PDF or Word and submit that file to Canvas.
